name: AutoCAD Batch Plot File
summary: A BP2 file contains a batch plot list created by version 14 or earlier of Autodesk AutoCAD. It stores a list of one or more files to publish to a plotter or printer via AutoCAD. BP2 files include the name of each file or sheet to be published and its file type, the number of copies to be printed, and the location where the file or sheet is saved.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
